meanings.definition: Baked too long or too much.
meanings.sent1: The cookies were overbaked and turned out hard as rocks.
meanings.sent2: The overbaked bread had a burnt taste to it.
meanings.sent3: The overbaked cake was so tough, it could be used as a doorstop.
meanings.sent4: Her overbaked pie was a reminder to set a timer next time.
meanings.sent5: The overbaked muffins were inedible, like little hockey pucks.

meanings.definition: To bake too long or too much.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally overbaked the brownies and they came out dry.
meanings.sent2: If you overbake the lasagna, it will be burnt on top.
meanings.sent3: She overbaked the cookies, turning them into charcoal discs.
meanings.sent4: The baker overbaked the croissants, making them too crispy.
meanings.sent5: Overbaking the pizza made the cheese bubble and brown.
